_json.gridTitle: How to Make a Gingerbread House Facade
_json.description: Step 8Let set, then use Royal Icing to glue onto back of facade. Turn facade over so you can work from the back. "Glue" panes into window frames: Outline back of frame with icing by piping a line 1/4 inch from edge of frame. Press "glass" into place. Let icing dry completely, about 1 hour. Turn house right side up. Embellish windows with icing, if desired.Â Step 9Lightly brush some un-iced areas of gingerbread with egg wash; liberally sprinkle nonpareils or sanding sugar over top.
